title: modify the explanation of MLA
author: xiaokongkong

comments.body:
inference/model.py

feasibly these lines should read

```diff
-     Multi-Headed Attention Layer (MLA).
+     Multi-head Latent Attention (MLA) layer.
```

```diff
-         Forward pass for the Multi-Headed Attention Layer (MLA).
+         Forward pass for the Multi-head Latent Attention (MLA) layer.
```

satisfaction_conditions: Correction of terminology in documentation to accurately reflect the proper name of the attention mechanism
Consistent naming convention throughout the codebase documentation
